title: Pixel 2 keeps restarting
content:
I have a pixel 2 (bought in December 2017), which is running android 10. This phone restarts once every time it touches 40-45% battery level. This issue has been going on since last 2 months (when the phone was running the last version of android). 
Just FYI - Storage remaining - 48%.
Any help would be appreciated.
